title: Fuel Volume Regulator Control Circuit/Open
description: The fuel volume regulator control circuit is open or disconnected.
causes: Disconnected wiring or faulty fuel regulator.
solutions: Inspect and reconnect wiring, replace regulator.
diagnosis: Use diagnostic tools to verify circuit continuity.

title: Fuel Volume Regulator Control Circuit Range/Performance
description: There is a range/performance issue with the fuel volume control.
symptoms: Reduced engine power, poor fuel economy.
causes: Faulty regulator or dirty fuel system.
solutions: Clean fuel system, replace defective parts.
diagnosis: Check sensor readings and fuel pressure.

title: Fuel Volume Regulator Control Circuit Low
description: Low signal detected in the fuel volume regulator control circuit.
solutions: Repair or replace wiring and connectors.
